attributes.action: Have MP's lead from the front and abandon their final salary pension schemes, that most of the private sector have already acknowledged are unsustainable and we, -and future generations-, cannot under the current financial mess we're facing afford the upkeep of.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once the MP's abandon their final salary pensions it will be much easier to tell local goverment to cease using the council tax system to fill their 'black holes'.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Pls simplify.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
